RelaunchNotification.title: Chrome update relaunch behavior
RelaunchNotification.description: 1 = relaunch is recommended, 2 = relaunch is required

PasswordManagerEnabled.title: Chrome Password Manager
PasswordManagerEnabled.description: If this setting is enabled, users can have Google Chrome memorize passwords and provide them automatically the next time they log in to a site.

CloudManagementEnrollmentToken.title: Cloud Enrollment
CloudManagementEnrollmentToken.description: Specify your Cloud Management Enrollment Token

DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled.title: Set Google Chrome as Default Browser
DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled.description: Set Google Chrome as Default Browser

BookmarkBarEnabled.title: Bookmark Bar
BookmarkBarEnabled.description: If you enable this setting, Google Chrome will show a bookmark bar

BrowserSignin.title: Sign-in behavior
BrowserSignin.description: 0 = Disable browser sign-in, 1 = Enable browser sign-in, 2 = Force users to sign-in to use the browser
